title: rAmA idu
sahitya:
rAmA idu dharmamA yAn


anupallavi

  kAmaadiyATr-unburalAmA varmamA raghu


caraNam 1    kAmAri tudi shei divya nAmA dasha vadana
 bhImA nirjita pUrNa sOmAnanA pattAbhi
 caraNam 2    kausalyA kumAra ahalyA shApOddhAra
 kalyANadAma nitya kalyANa dasharatha
 caraNam 3    vAsavan paNi ayOdhyA vAsa bhadrAdri rAma
 dAsark-karuL shei rAmadAsan paNiyum jaya
